abstract: Grockit, a start-up, thinks students learn better when they take classes online with friends.
snippet: Grockit, a start-up, thinks students learn better when they take classes online with friends.
lead_paragraph: About half of students who take the SAT do nothing to prepare. Grockit, an education start-up, wants to change that by making test prep social and taking it online.

headline.main: Grockit Raises Money for Online Test Prep
